response.original_title: Less Than Jake - Goodbye Blue & White (Live DVD)
response.overview: As the band's tale takes another unexpected turn, Less than Jake once again pops open the envelope with the re-release of their 2002 album GOODBYE BLUE AND WHITE on the band's own label Sleep It Off Records. This 20 track collection of early B-Sides from 1996 to 2002 (Including the bands' outrageous renditions of Metal classics by Slayer and Twisted Sister) is reinvented with brand new artwork from artist Horsebites and an amazing companion DVD packed full of live footage. Experience the songs in live performances over the last 10 years from Japan, Australia, Europe, UK and beyond.
response.title: Less Than Jake - Goodbye Blue & White (Live DVD)
